# Summary

In this package, you will find various functions for working with meteorological data, as well as some datasets containing information from different weather stations.

# Installation

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("bdirienzo/goatR")
```

# Getting help

If you encounter a bug or wish to request a new feature, please:

1.  Check if the issue has already been reported in our [[issue tracker](%5Bhttps://github.com/bdirienzo/goatR/issues)](<https://github.com/your_username/your_repository/issues>).

2.  If not, please file an issue with a minimal reproducible example on [GitHub](https://github.com/bdirienzo/goatR/issues):

    -   A detailed description of the problem.

    -   Steps to reproduce it.

    -   A minimal reproducible example.

    -   Information about your environment (R version, operating system, package version).

For questions and other discussion, please send us an email at:

-   Email: [bdirienzo\@mail.austral.edu.ar](mailto:bdirienzo@mail.austral.edu.ar)

-   Email: [lsanfilippo\@mail.austral.edu.ar](mailto:lsanfilippo@mail.austral.edu.ar)

We are committed to continually improving **goatR** and appreciate your feedback and participation.
